definition: acrobatic display (esp. on horseback) (old)/variant of 懈[xie4] and 邂[xie4] (old)
to divide/to break up/to split/to separate/to dissolve/to solve/to melt/to remove/to untie/to loosen/to open/to emancipate/to explain/to understand/to know/a solution/a dissection
to construct/to form/to make up/to compose/literary composition/paper mulberry (Broussonetia papyrifera)

sentences.english: The thought is determined by its ability to deconstruct the real.
sentences.chinese: 這個想法是取決於它是否能真正的解構。

sentences.english: What does deconstructing Jobs have to do with developing talent?
sentences.chinese: 解構喬布斯跟發展能力有什麼關係嗎？

sentences.english: This ambivalence subverts and deconstructs logos centre doctrine.
sentences.chinese: 這種雙重性認識是對邏各斯中心主義的顛覆和解構。

sentences.english: People with indigenous belief systems don't have to bother deconstructing anything.
sentences.chinese: 而持有土著民族信仰體系的人們則無需擔心解構什麼。

sentences.english: Innovative textual reading is a deconstructive reading.
sentences.chinese: 思辨創新式閱讀是一種解構閱讀。

sentences.english: This is a common response to deconstruction.
sentences.chinese: 這是對解構主義的普遍反應。

sentences.english: The deconstruction of the postmodernism will inevitably result in the collapsing of semantics.
sentences.chinese: 後現代主義解構的結果必然會導致語意的斷裂。

sentences.english: Derrida Deconstruct the privileging of shit over crap.
sentences.chinese: 將大便對拉屎的特權解構。

sentences.english: Jacques Derrida is famous for deconstructionism.
sentences.chinese: 德里達是以解構主義而著稱於世的。

sentences.english: Nevertheless, the Sociology of Science and Knowledge (SSK) takes a new look at it.
sentences.chinese: 然而，科學知識社會學卻對之進行了社會學的解構。

sentences.english: For supersolvable arrangement, a maximal chain of modular elements is computed in the program.
sentences.chinese: 對超可解構形，給出了一個模元極大鏈。

sentences.english: There is an obvious tendency in Venuti's translation studies.
sentences.chinese: 文章認爲韋努蒂的翻譯研究具有明顯的解構主義特徵。

sentences.english: There are mutual influence and interactive relationship between Deconstructive theory and Feminism.
sentences.chinese: 解構理論與女性主義之間存在影響與互動的關係。

sentences.english: This fragmentation of a work is called "deconstruction."
sentences.chinese: 這種對作品的分拆破解叫做“解構”。

sentences.english: One name for these possibilities and limits might be deconstruction.
sentences.chinese: 這種可能性和侷限性的名字就是解構。

sentences.english: The term presents in the western thoughts of deconstruction at first.
sentences.chinese: “誤讀”這一術語首先出現於西方解構主義思潮。

definition: to interpret/to comment and explain/to annotate/to perform (i.e. interpret a theatrical role)/to decode/interpretation/annotation
to construct (often sth abstract, such as good relations)/to set up/to develop/construction (abstract)/architecture
arteries and veins/network of blood vessels/vascular system (of a plant or animal)/(fig.) fabric (i.e. underlying structure, as in "social fabric")/overall context
to come up with an idea/generation of ideas/inspiration
to restore to the original state/to reconstruct (an event)/reduction (chemistry)
aspect/facet/level (political, psychological, spiritual etc)/(geology) bedding plane
to relate (a story or information)/to tell or talk about/to recount/narration/telling/narrative/account
